import React, { useEffect, useState } from 'react'; import './MyPage.css'; import SearchPage from '../SearchPage/SearchPage'; function MyPage({ card }) { const [showCard, setShowCard] = useState([]); const myArt = localStorage.getItem('card'); setShowCard(myArt); return (


Welcome to Your Favorites!

{' '} Here you can compile your own Art Collection!

{showCard.map((card) => (
{card.artist}

{card.title}
{card.bio}

{card.notes}

Link to the Metropolitan Museum site Link to the Wikipedia page

))}
); } export default MyPage;
